title: VERA FILES FACT CHECK: Duterte falsely claims he never accepts awards
subtitle: He did in 2017.
author: verafiles.org
vclaim:
President Rodrigo Duterte made a false claim when he said he does not accept awards.

In a speech Nov. 27, during the inauguration of the Bohol-Panglao International Airport, Duterte said:

The president accepted the Man of the Year 2016 from the Manila Times on Feb. 10, 2017, saying in his speech it was an exception to his “personal and official policy not to accept awards all these years:”

Days later, on Feb. 23, he was bestowed the Knight Grand Cross of Rizal Rank, the highest form of recognition given to an individual by civic organization Knights of Rizal, for his “unprecedented victory as President and restoring people’s faith in government.”

Duterte also accepted the award and said the recognition was “truly humbling:”

Among the awards and recognition the president has shunned in the past is the honorary doctorate conferred by the University of the Philippines in April 2017.

Presidential Communications Operations Office, Speech during the inauguration of Bohol-Panglao International Airport, Nov. 27, 2018

The Manila Times, Duterte is The Manila Times ‘Man of the Year’, Feb. 11, 2018

RTVM, Speech of President Rodrigo Duterte at the Manila Times 5th Business Forum, Feb. 11, 2017

RTVM, 21st International Assembly and Conference of the Knights of Rizal, Feb. 23, 2017
